function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of universal commercialization of 5G technology","Impact":"Limited availability of 5G services for application scenarios","Mitigation":"Accelerate the commercialization of 5G technology for broader adoption","Technologies":"5G infrastructure development, policy support for 5G deployment","People":"Users of smart healthcare, industry 4.0, VR/AR applications","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government regulators"},{"Description":"Insufficient research on business and social value of 5G","Impact":"Limited understanding of the overall impact of 5G technology on business and society","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on the business and social value of 5G technology","Technologies":"Data analytics, social impact assessment tools","People":"Businesses, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Spread of rumors and panic related to 5G technology","Impact":"Public panic and misinformation leading to distrust in 5G technology","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, fact-based communication, debunking misinformation","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, social media monitoring tools","People":"General public, 5G technology users","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government authorities"}]}
